item.tetra.scroll.sword/mmt_malum_scythe: A scythe that can shatter souls, harvesting the corresponding essence from monsters and spawning it at your location (vanilla mobs only). When paired with its specialized enhancement layer, it can trigger combo effects. Special sharpening and soul harvesting properties can increase essence drop rates.
tetra/schematic/sword/more_mod_tetra/mal: A scythe that can shatter souls, harvesting the corresponding essence from monsters and spawning it at your location (vanilla mobs only). When paired with its specialized enhancement layer, it can trigger combo effects. Special sharpening and soul harvesting properties can increase essence drop rates.
tetra.module.sword/more_mod_tetra/malum/: A scythe that can shatter souls, harvesting the corresponding essence from monsters and spawning it at your location (vanilla mobs only). When paired with its specialized enhancement layer, it can trigger combo effects. Special sharpening and soul harvesting properties can increase essence drop rates.

item.tetra.scroll.shared/the_legend_scro: The Legend Scroll of Sky Titan
Chapter I: Sky's Guidance
A secret scroll found in the dawn light of a sky city from another world, which can grant tools the power to heal their wielder.
tetra.improvement.the_legend_scroll_of_s: The Legend Scroll of Sky Titan: Sky's Guidance
The tool gains the ability to heal the wielder every 5 seconds and increase the healing amount.
tetra/schematic/shared/more_mod_tetra/ti: Sky's Guidance
The tool gains the ability to heal the wielder every 5 seconds and increase the healing amount.
item.tetra.scroll.shared/the_legend_scro: The Legend Scroll of Earth Titan
Chapter II: Earth's Protection
A scroll left behind by a flying dragon from the boundless ancient lands of another world, said to bestow protective power. It records methods for providing damage absorption to the tool's wielder.
tetra.improvement.the_legend_scroll_of_e: The Legend Scroll of Earth Titan: Earth's Protection
The tool gains the ability to provide a shield based on the wielder's attack power when attacking.
tetra/schematic/shared/more_mod_tetra/ti: Earth's Protection
The tool gains the ability to provide a shield based on the wielder's attack power when attacking.
item.tetra.scroll.shared/the_legend_scro: The Legend Scroll of Ocean Titan
Chapter III: Ocean's Echo
A scroll inspired by an artisan who passed through a siren city and heard their songs. It records methods for applying various negative effects to attack targets.
tetra.improvement.the_legend_scroll_of_o: The Legend Scroll of Ocean Titan: Ocean's Echo
The tool gains the ability to apply various negative effects to targets when attacking.
tetra/schematic/shared/more_mod_tetra/ti: Ocean's Echo
The tool gains the ability to apply various negative effects to targets when attacking.
item.tetra.scroll.shared/the_legend_scro: The Legend Scroll of Romance Titan
Chapter IV: Romance's Companion
A weaver from another world spun time into golden threads, and a fragment of it was obtained by an unknown artisan, creating a scroll that can reduce enemies' invincibility frames.
tetra.improvement.the_legend_scroll_of_r: The Legend Scroll of Romance Titan: Romance's Companion
The tool gains the ability to reduce enemy invincibility time when attacking.
tetra/schematic/shared/more_mod_tetra/ti: Romance's Companion
The tool gains the ability to reduce enemy invincibility time when attacking.
item.tetra.scroll.shared/the_legend_scro: The Legend Scroll of Worldbearing Titan
Chapter V: Worldbearing Endeavor
A thief from another world, bearing the fire seeds of thirty million reincarnations, reignites futile flames. The scroll records a special improvement that increases damage based on kills.
tetra.improvement.the_legend_scroll_of_w: The Legend Scroll of Worldbearing Titan: Worldbearing Endeavor
The tool gains the ability to increase damage based on the number of targets killed by the tool.
tetra/schematic/shared/more_mod_tetra/ti: Worldbearing Endeavor
The tool gains the ability to increase damage based on the number of targets killed by the tool.
item.tetra.scroll.shared/the_legend_scro: The Legend Scroll of Reason Titan
Chapter VI: Reason's Enlightenment
From an academic institution in another world, swallowed by the black tide. The surviving forging scroll records a special improvement that increases experience gain.
tetra.improvement.the_legend_scroll_of_r: The Legend Scroll of Reason Titan: Reason's Enlightenment
The tool gains the ability to increase experience gain.
tetra/schematic/shared/more_mod_tetra/ti: Reason's Enlightenment
The tool gains the ability to increase experience gain.
item.tetra.scroll.shared/the_legend_scro: The Legend Scroll of Trickery Titan
Chapter VII: Trickery's Blessing
A peculiar scroll recording the thieving experiences of a notorious thief from another world. It can add a special improvement to the crafting table that grants extra loot from targets.
tetra.improvement.the_legend_scroll_of_t: The Legend Scroll of Trickery Titan: Trickery's Blessing
The tool gains the ability to obtain extra loot after killing targets.
tetra/schematic/shared/more_mod_tetra/ti: Trickery's Blessing
The tool gains the ability to obtain extra loot after killing targets.
item.tetra.scroll.shared/the_legend_scro: The Legend Scroll of Strife Titan
Chapter VIII: Strife Forging

A forging technique from the city-states of strife in another world, which can be used to modify tool parts such as [Longsword/Greatsword/Rapier/Katana/Flanged Mace/Blade Bow] according to the methods recorded within.
The Legend Scroll of Death Titan
Chapter IX: Death's Blessing

The original scroll was written by the Daughter of the Underworld from another world with the waters of the abyss. It can add a special improvement to the tool that protects the wielder from death for a short time.
tetra.improvement.the_legend_scroll_of_d: The Legend Scroll of Death Titan: Death's Blessing
The tool gains the ability to protect the wielder from death for a short time.
tetra/schematic/shared/more_mod_tetra/ti: Death's Blessing
The tool gains the ability to protect the wielder from death for a short time.
item.tetra.scroll.shared/the_legend_scro: The Legend Scroll of Time Titan
Chapter X: Time's Remembrance
A peculiar forging scroll based on a strange book from another world that recorded countless stories. It can add a special improvement to the tool that records health and increases damage.
tetra.improvement.the_legend_scroll_of_t: The Legend Scroll of Time Titan: Time's Remembrance
The tool gains the ability to record health after attacking and provide buffs based on health changes.
tetra/schematic/shared/more_mod_tetra/ti: Time's Remembrance
The tool gains the ability to record health after attacking and provide buffs based on health changes.

A scroll inspired by the image of a king playing chess with a god in another world. It records a special improvement that allows the tool to gain bonuses based on the target's health.

The tool gains the ability to gain bonuses based on the target's health.
tetra/schematic/shared/more_mod_tetra/ti: Law's Judgment
The tool gains the ability to gain bonuses based on the target's health.

A scroll made from a blank piece of paper left by a messenger who delivered information to countless city-states in another world. It records a special improvement that allows the loot of killed targets to be remotely transported.

tetra/schematic/mmt_ring/base_ring/guard: The Guardian Ring can increase the wearer's armor value, and the increase amount is related to the hardness.
tetra/schematic/mmt_ring/base_ring/jank_: The Magnetic Ring can attract surrounding dropped items. The attraction range is related to the hardness, density, and toughness.
tetra/schematic/mmt_ring/inlay/gem.name: Gem Inlay
tetra/schematic/mmt_ring/inlay/gem.descr: Replace the current inlay on the ring. The hardness of the gem will increase the critical hit rate.
tetra.module.mmt_ring/inlay/gem.name: Inlay
tetra/schematic/mmt_ring/base_ring/criti: The Critical Strike Ring can provide additional critical hit rate and critical hit damage. The critical hit rate is related to the hardness.
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_critical_st:
There is a §e%1$s%%§r chance for attacks to increase the damage of that hit by §e%2$s%%§r.
§7The critical strike attributes of all accessories are summed up and calculated together, meaning all can take effect. (For example, the 20 critical hit from 2 rings and 10 critical hit damage can be added up, and the final result is that the player gets 40 critical hit and 20 critical hit damage)
§7(Calculated separately from Tetra's own critical strike)
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_critic: Attacks have a chance to critically hit and deal multiple times the damage.
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_jank.name: Accessory·Magnetism
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_jank.toolti: Attracts items and experience orbs within §e%1$s§r blocks around the target.
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_jank.t: The holder attracts surrounding dropped items and experience orbs.
more_mod_tetra.attribute.luck.name: Luck
more_mod_tetra.attribute.max_health.name: Maximum Health
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_feather_fal: Reduces the §eFall Damage§r taken by the holder by §e%1$s%%§r.
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_feathe: Reduces the fall damage taken by the holder.
tetra/schematic/mmt_shoes/upper/sports_s: Crafts the shoe upper into a sports shoe style. The movement speed bonus has a relatively high base value. The material's density reduces movement speed, while hardness increases it.
tetra/schematic/mmt_shoes/sole/flat_sole: Crafts the shoe sole into a flat sole type. The material's toughness increases fall protection, while hardness and density increase knockback resistance. However, density also slightly reduces movement speed.
tetra/schematic/mmt_shoes/sole/spiked_sh: Crafts the shoe sole into a spiked sole type, which has a relatively high base knockback resistance but a lower base speed. The material's toughness increases fall protection, while hardness and density increase knockback resistance. However, density also slightly reduces movement speed.
tetra/schematic/mmt_shoes/sole/platform_: Crafts the shoe sole into a platform sole type, which can provide a step - height attribute but reduces the base speed. The material's toughness increases fall protection, while hardness and density increase the step - height. However, density also slightly reduces movement speed.
tetra/schematic/mmt_shoes/upper/long_boo: Crafts the shoe upper into a long - boots type, which can provide knockback resistance but has a relatively low base speed. The material's density reduces movement speed and increases knockback resistance, while hardness increases both movement speed and knockback resistance.
tetra/schematic/mmt_shoes/upper/short_bo: Crafts the shoe upper into a short - boots type, which can provide a step - height but has a relatively low base speed. The material's density reduces movement speed and increases the step - height, while hardness increases both movement speed and the step - height.
tetra/schematic/mmt_shoes/sole/block_sol: Makes the sole out of a block, which can acquire some properties of the block.
tetra/schematic/mmt_glove/base_glove/sof: Crafts the glove into a soft - glove type using materials. The attack speed can be enhanced according to the toughness of the material, while the density of the material will slightly reduce the attack speed.
tetra/schematic/mmt_glove/base_glove/har: Crafts the glove into a hard - glove type using materials. The attack power can be enhanced according to the hardness of the material. The density of the material will enhance the attack power and reduce the attack speed.
tetra/schematic/mmt_glove/wristband/heav: Crafts the wristband into a heavy - wristband type using materials. The attack power can be enhanced according to the density of the material.
tetra/schematic/mmt_glove/wristband/swif: Crafts the wristband into a swift - wristband type using materials. The attack speed can be enhanced according to the toughness of the material.
tetra/schematic/mmt_glove/wristband/hard: Crafts the wristband into a hard - wristband type using materials. The armor value and armor toughness can be enhanced according to the hardness of the material.
tetra/schematic/mmt_bracelet/base_bracel: The Critical Strike Bracelet can provide additional critical hit damage and critical hit rate. The critical hit damage is related to the hardness of the material.

The Resistance Bracelet can provide damage reduction attributes. The damage reduction amount is related to the hardness and density of the material, but the increase is relatively small. The main source of damage reduction still comes from the Resistance Bracelet itself.
The Luck Bracelet can enhance the wearer's luck value, which is related to the hardness, density, and toughness of the material.
tetra/schematic/mmt_bracelet/inlay/gem.d: Replace the current inlay on the bracelet. The hardness of the gem will enhance critical hit damage.
tetra.module.mmt_bracelet/inlay/gem.name: Inlay
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_protect.too: When hit, reduces the damage taken by §e%1$s%%§r.
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_protec: Reduces the damage taken by the accessory wearer.
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_jump.name: Accessory·Jump Boost
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_jump.toolti: Provides §e%1$s§r levels of jump boost for the wearer.
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_jump.t: Provides 1 level of jump boost for the wearer.
tetra/schematic/mmt_crown/crown_ring/kin: The King's Crown can provide percentage - based attribute bonuses. The hardness of the material enhances attack power and armor value, the density enhances health, armor toughness and reduces movement speed, and the toughness enhances movement speed and attack speed.
tetra/schematic/mmt_crown/top/gem.name: Gem Inlay
tetra/schematic/mmt_crown/top/gem.descri: Replace the current inlay on the crown. The hardness and density of the gem will enhance the luck value.
tetra.module.mmt_crown/top/gem.name: Inlay
tetra/schematic/mmt_emblem/emblem_type/w: Craft the emblem pattern of the warrior emblem using materials. It can provide a melee damage bonus based on the three - dimensional attributes of the material.
tetra/schematic/mmt_emblem/emblem_type/r: Craft the emblem pattern of the ranger emblem using materials. It can provide a projectile damage bonus based on the three - dimensional attributes of the material.
tetra/schematic/mmt_emblem/emblem_type/s: Craft the emblem pattern of the sorcerer emblem using materials. It can provide a magic damage bonus based on the three - dimensional attributes of the material.
tetra/schematic/mmt_emblem/emblem_type/k: Craft the emblem pattern of the knight emblem using materials. It can provide damage reduction based on the three - dimensional attributes of the material.
tetra/schematic/mmt_emblem/emblem_type/a: Craft the emblem pattern of the avenger emblem using materials. It can provide an overall damage boost based on the three - dimensional attributes of the material, but the value is relatively lower compared to emblems specialized in one type of damage.
tetra/schematic/mmt_emblem/emblem_ring/b: The emblem ring can provide a luck value, which is related to the hardness and density of the material.
tetra/schematic/mmt_emblem/emblem_type/b: A blank emblem with no special abilities.

more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_all_damage_: When wearing this accessory, it will increase the §eAll Damage§r dealt by the holder by §e%1$s%%§r.
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_all_da: When wearing this accessory, it will increase all damage.
tetra/schematic/mmt_heart_protecting_mir: Craft the base of the heart-protecting mirror into a type that buffers impact. It can provide damage reduction based on toughness.
Craft the base of the heart-protecting mirror into a type that provides armor value. It can provide armor value and armor toughness based on hardness and density respectively.
Embed a core that enhances health in the center of the heart-protecting mirror. The health increase is related to the density of the material.
Change the appearance of the amulet.
tetra.variant_category.dye.label: Dye
tetra/schematic/mmt_crown/crown_ring/wiz:
(Unlocks the synthesis of this part when the Iron Magic mod is installed)
Compared to the King's Crown, the Wizard's Crown converts various attribute bonuses into Iron Magic spell attributes. The hardness of the materials used in crafting enhances spell power and summoning damage, the density enhances mana capacity, mana regeneration, and spell resistance, and the toughness enhances chant reduction and cooldown reduction.
tetra.variant_category.block_sole.label: Block
tetra.variant_category.dye_item.label: Dye
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_magma_walke: Allows the wearer to walk on §eLava§r and §eimmune to lava block damage§r.
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_magma_: Allows the wearer to walk on lava and immune to lava block damage.
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_water_walke: Allows the wearer to walk on §eWater§r.
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_water_: Allows the wearer to walk on water.
tetra/schematic/mmt_jetpack/shell/base_s: Replace the material of the jetpack shell. The flight speed can be enhanced according to the hardness.
tetra/schematic/mmt_jetpack/battery/base: Replace the material of the jetpack battery to enhance the flight duration.
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_fly.name: Accessory·Jet Flight
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_fly.tooltip:
Holding the spacebar allows the wearer to fly for §e%1$s§r seconds, with a flight speed of §e%2$s*0.01§r.
§7(The default creative mode flight speed is 0.1, which is 10 * 0.01.)
tetra/schematic/mmt_ring/inlay/cast_time: Replace the current inlay on the ring. The hardness of the Quick Casting Gem will enhance chant reduction and provide a slight increase in critical hit rate.
tetra/schematic/mmt_ring/inlay/cooldown_: Replace the current inlay on the ring. The hardness of the Cooldown Reduction Gem will enhance cooldown reduction and provide a slight increase in critical hit rate.
tetra/schematic/mmt_necklace/pendant/arc: Replace the current pendant with an arcane crystal. Mana regeneration can be enhanced according to the hardness of the material, and mana value can be enhanced according to the density.
tetra/schematic/mmt_necklace/pendant/nar: Replace the current pendant with a sickle - blade shape. Sickle proficiency can be enhanced according to the hardness of the material.
tetra/schematic/mmt_necklace/pendant/mys: Replace the current pendant with a lens shape. Arcane resonance can be enhanced according to the density of the material. Arcane resonance can enhance the additional intensity of the effects triggered when collecting essences.
tetra/schematic/mmt_totem_of_undying/tot: Replace the totem shell.Hardness reduces the totem cooldown time, and density increases the totem's health restoration ratio.
Replace the totem core.Hardness increases the buff duration provided by the totem, and density increases the buff level provided by the totem.
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_totem_effec:
(Can be triggered in the main/off - hand or accessory slot) When triggering a modularly modified Totem of Undying, it will increase the buff duration by §e%1$s§r seconds and the buff level by §e%2$s§r.
§7(The original Totem of Undying effect is: 40s Fire Protection, 45s Regeneration II, 5s Absorption II.)
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_totem_: Determines the buff level when the player triggers a modular Totem of Undying.
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_totem_coold:
(Can be triggered in the main/off - hand or accessory slot) When triggering a modularly modified Totem of Undying, all Tetra totems will enter a §e%1$s§r - second cooldown.
§7(Tetra tools of the same type share the cooldown time, and totems are in a separate category, so it won't affect the use of other tools. If the totem is on cooldown, it won't trigger death immunity.)
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_totem_: Determines the cooldown when the player triggers a modular Totem of Undying.
more_mod_tetra.effect.curios_totem_healt:
(Can be triggered in the main/off - hand or accessory slot) When triggering a modularly modified Totem of Undying, it will restore §e%1$s%%§r of the holder's health.
§7At least 1 point of health will be restored.
tetra.stats.more_mod_tetra:curios_totem_: Determines the health restored when the player triggers a modular Totem of Undying.
tetra/schematic/mmt_iron_staff/core/spel: Replace the style of the staff's spellcasting core.
tetra/schematic/mmt_iron_staff/head/base: A staff top component with balanced attributes.The hardness of the material will enhance spell power and damage power.
tetra/schematic/mmt_iron_staff/head/spel: A staff top component inclined to casting spells. Its integrity consumption is slightly higher than that of the standard staff top.The hardness of the material increases more spell power and less summoning damage when enhancing spell power and summoning damage.
tetra/schematic/mmt_iron_staff/head/conj: A staff top component inclined to summoning monsters to assist in combat. Its integrity consumption is slightly higher than that of the standard staff top.The hardness of the material increases more summoning damage and less spell power when enhancing spell power and summoning damage.
tetra/schematic/mmt_iron_staff/handle/ba: A staff handle component with balanced attributes.The hardness of the material will increase the maximum mana, and the density will increase mana regeneration and reduce attack speed.
tetra/schematic/mmt_iron_staff/handle/ma: A staff handle component that can store more mana. Its integrity consumption is slightly lower.The hardness of the material will increase more maximum mana, and the density can also increase maximum mana. However, the mana regeneration increased by the density is lower, and the attack speed reduction is greater.
tetra/schematic/mmt_iron_staff/handle/re: A staff handle component that can resonate with natural mana. Its integrity consumption is slightly lower.The hardness and density of the material will increase a small amount of mana regeneration and maximum mana. However, the attack speed reduction caused by the density is also increased.
tetra/schematic/mmt_iron_staff/crystals/: Use materials as inlay materials for the bottom of the staff handle.The hardness of the material will increase cooldown reduction and chant reduction.
Use inlayable materials as inlay items for the bottom of the staff handle.The component will provide a fixed amount of cooldown reduction and chant reduction.
tetra/schematic/mmt_iron_staff/inscripti: Grind the materials into powder and blend them into the rune grooves engraved on the staff.The hardness of the material will increase the spell resistance provided by the staff.
Incorporate runes into the rune grooves engraved on the staff.It will provide single - type spell power and single - type spell resistance according to the rune type.
